question: Doddabetta Peak is located in which of the following hill range?
explanation: At least 24 peaks above 2,000 metres (6,600 ft)are situated in the Nilgiri Hills range. It is located in the Westernmost part of Tamil Nadu state (At the junction of Karnataka and Kerala states) in Southern India. They are the part of the larger Western Ghats mountain range chain making up the southwestern edge of the Deccan Plateau.
